mapper.select:
SELECT concat(d.order_no,'
',o.order_name,bt.bus_type_code,' ',o.order_qty,'台') order_desc,d.prod_factory_id, group_concat(d.prod_factory,'_',f.id) AS prod_factory, group_concat(d.factory_id,'_',d.factory,'||',d.tech_list separator ';') tech_detail_list, group_concat(d.factory_id,'_',d.factory,'||',(select count(f.bus_number) from BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW f where f.confirmor_date is not null and f.confirmor_date !='' and f.factory=d.factory and f.order_no=d.order_no and f.tech_task_id = #{task_id}) separator ';') follow_detail FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_DETAIL d LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o ON o.order_no=d.order_no LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_BUS_TYPE bt on bt.id=o.bus_type_id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f ON d.prod_factory = f.factory_name WHERE d.tech_task_id=#{task_id} group by d.order_no

SELECT concat(o.order_no,' ',o.order_name,bt.bus_type_code,' ',o.order_qty,'台') order_desc, group_concat(f.id,'_',f.factory_name,'||','' separator ';') tech_detail_list FROM BMS_OR_ORDER o LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_FACTORY_ORDER fo ON o.id=fo.order_id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_BUS_TYPE bt ON bt.id=o.bus_type_id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f ON f.id=fo.factory_id WHERE o.order_no=#{order_no} GROUP BY o.order_no

SELECT concat('{',group_concat('"',workshop,'":',online_count separator ','),'}') tech_bus_info FROM( SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count, '焊装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.welding_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.welding_online_date is not null and b.welding_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'涂装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.painting_online_date is not null and b.painting_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'底盘' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.chassis_online_date is not null and b.chassis_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'总装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.assembly_online_date is not null and b.assembly_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'检测线' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.testline_online_date is not null and b.testline_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) ) tmp

SELECT concat('{',group_concat('"',workshop,'":',online_count separator ','),'}') tech_bus_info FROM( SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count, '焊装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.welding_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.welding_online_date is not null and b.welding_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'涂装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.painting_online_date is not null and b.painting_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'底盘' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.chassis_online_date is not null and b.chassis_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'总装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.assembly_online_date is not null and b.assembly_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count,'检测线' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.testline_online_date is not null and b.testline_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) ) tmp where tmp.workshop in
#{item}

SELECT concat('{',group_concat('"',workshop,'":',online_count separator ','),'}') tech_bus_info FROM(
SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count, '焊装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.welding_online_date,1,10)<=#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.welding_online_date is not null and b.welding_online_date !=''
and (b.painting_online_date is null or b.painting_online_date ='' or substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.chassis_online_date is null or b.chassis_online_date ='' or substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.assembly_online_date is null or b.assembly_online_date ='' or substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.testline_online_date is null or b.testline_online_date ='' or substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list})
SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count, '涂装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10)<=#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.painting_online_date is not null and b.painting_online_date !=''
and (b.painting_online_date is null or b.painting_online_date ='' or substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.chassis_online_date is null or b.chassis_online_date ='' or substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.assembly_online_date is null or b.assembly_online_date ='' or substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.testline_online_date is null or b.testline_online_date ='' or substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list})
SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count, '底盘' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10)<=#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.chassis_online_date is not null and b.chassis_online_date !=''
and (b.painting_online_date is null or b.painting_online_date ='' or substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.chassis_online_date is null or b.chassis_online_date ='' or substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.assembly_online_date is null or b.assembly_online_date ='' or substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.testline_online_date is null or b.testline_online_date ='' or substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list})
SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count, '总装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10)<=#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.assembly_online_date is not null and b.assembly_online_date !=''
and (b.painting_online_date is null or b.painting_online_date ='' or substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.chassis_online_date is null or b.chassis_online_date ='' or substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.assembly_online_date is null or b.assembly_online_date ='' or substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.testline_online_date is null or b.testline_online_date ='' or substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list})
SELECT count(b.bus_number) online_count, '检测线' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10)<=#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.testline_online_date is not null and b.testline_online_date !=''
and (b.painting_online_date is null or b.painting_online_date ='' or substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.chassis_online_date is null or b.chassis_online_date ='' or substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.assembly_online_date is null or b.assembly_online_date ='' or substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.testline_online_date is null or b.testline_online_date ='' or substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list})
)tmp

SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory,'焊装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.welding_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.welding_online_date is not null and b.welding_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory,'涂装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.painting_online_date is not null and b.painting_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory,'底盘' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.chassis_online_date is not null and b.chassis_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory,'总装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.assembly_online_date is not null and b.assembly_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory,'检测线' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.testline_online_date is not null and b.testline_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list})

SELECT tmp.* FROM( SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory, '焊装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.welding_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.welding_online_date is not null and b.welding_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory,'涂装' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.painting_online_date is not null and b.painting_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT #{tech_task_id} substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.chassis_online_date is not null and b.chassis_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.assembly_online_date is not null and b.assembly_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) union all SELECT #{tech_task_id} tech_task_id,b.bus_number,o.order_no,f.factory_name factory,'检测线' workshop FROM BMS_PLAN_BUS b LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id WHERE substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10)<#{tech_date} and (b.dispatch_date is null OR b.dispatch_date ='') and b.testline_online_date is not null and b.testline_online_date !='' and o.order_no=#{order_no} and f.factory_name in (#{factory_list}) ) tmp where tmp.workshop in
#{item}

and (b.painting_online_date is null or b.painting_online_date ='' or substring(b.painting_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.chassis_online_date is null or b.chassis_online_date ='' or substring(b.chassis_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.assembly_online_date is null or b.assembly_online_date ='' or substring(b.assembly_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})
and (b.testline_online_date is null or b.testline_online_date ='' or substring(b.testline_online_date,1,10) >#{tech_date})

)tmp
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW (tech_task_id,bus_number,order_no,factory,workshop,task_detail_id) values
(#{item.tech_task_id},#{item.bus_number},#{item.order_no},#{item.factory},#{item.workshop}, (SELECT d.id FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_DETAIL d WHERE d.tech_task_id = #{item.tech_task_id} AND d.order_no = #{item.order_no} AND d.factory = #{item.factory}))
mapper.update:
update BMS_TECH_TASK
switch_mode=#{switch_mode},
switch_node=#{switch_node},
assigner_id=#{editor_id},
assign_date=#{edit_date},
tech_single_price=#{tech_single_price},
where id=#{tech_task_id}
mapper.select: select time_list from BMS_TECH_TASK_DETAIL where tech_task_id=#{tech_task_id} and order_no=#{order_no} and factory=#{factory}

update.foreach:
update BMS_HR_STAFF_TECH_HOURS
status=#{detail.status},
work_hour=#{detail.workHour},
editor_id=#{detail.editorId},
edit_date=#{detail.editDate},
approver_id=#{detail.approverId},
approve_date=#{detail.approveDate},
hour_price=#{detail.techSinglePrice},
where id=#{detail.id}
and status !='3'

mapper.select: call P_CACULATE_ECN_SALLARY(#{factory},#{workshop},'','',#{workMonth});

SELECT t.task_content,t.tech_order_no,t.tech_date,concat(d.order_no,'
',o.order_name,bt.bus_type_code,' ',o.order_qty,'台') order_desc,d.factory, group_concat(d.tech_list separator ',') as tech_list,group_concat(d.time_list separator ',') as time_list,t.custom_change_no, sum(case d.time_total when '' then 0 else time_total end ) as time_total, sum(case d.single_time_total when '' then 0 else single_time_total end ) as single_time_total,t.major_change,t.custom_change,sum(t.tech_point_num) tech_point_num FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_DETAIL d LEFT JOIN BMS_TECH_TASK t ON d.tech_task_id=t.id LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o ON o.order_no=d.order_no LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_BUS_TYPE bt on bt.id=o.bus_type_id WHERE 1=1 AND custom_change='Y' AND major_change='Y' AND repeat_change='Y' AND d.order_no=#{order_no} AND t.tech_order_no like concat('%',#{tech_order_no},'%') AND t.task_content like concat('%',#{task_content},'%') AND d.factory=#{factory} AND t.tech_date>=#{tech_date_start} AND t.tech_date<=#{tech_date_end} GROUP BY d.tech_task_id,d.factory,d.order_no GROUP BY d.tech_task_id,d.order_no order by d.order_no

SELECT COUNT(tt.task_content) FROM ( SELECT t.task_content,t.tech_order_no,t.tech_date,concat(d.order_no,'
',o.order_name,bt.bus_type_code,' ',o.order_qty,'台') order_desc,d.factory, group_concat(d.tech_list separator ',') as tech_list,group_concat(d.time_list separator ',') as time_list,t.custom_change_no, sum(case d.time_total when '' then 0 else time_total end ) as time_total, sum(case d.single_time_total when '' then 0 else single_time_total end ) as single_time_total,t.major_change,t.custom_change,sum(t.tech_point_num) tech_point_num FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_DETAIL d LEFT JOIN BMS_TECH_TASK t ON d.tech_task_id=t.id LEFT JOIN BMS_OR_ORDER o ON o.order_no=d.order_no LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_BUS_TYPE bt on bt.id=o.bus_type_id WHERE 1=1 AND custom_change='Y' AND major_change='Y' AND repeat_change='Y' AND d.order_no=#{order_no} AND t.tech_order_no like concat('%',#{tech_order_no},'%') AND t.task_content like concat('%',#{task_content},'%') AND d.factory=#{factory} AND t.tech_date>=#{tech_date_start} AND t.tech_date<=#{tech_date_end} GROUP BY d.tech_task_id,d.factory,d.order_no GROUP BY d.tech_task_id,d.order_no order by d.order_no ) tt

select f.id,t.task_content,f.factory,f.workshop from BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW f left join BMS_TECH_TASK t on t.id=f.tech_task_id where f.bus_number=#{bus_number} and (f.confirmor_date<=0 or f.confirmor_date is null)

select tmp.tech_task_id,tmp.factory,group_concat(tmp.workshop,':',tmp.follow_num) follow_detail from( select f.tech_task_id,f.factory,f.workshop,count(f.bus_number) follow_num from BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW f where f.tech_task_id in( select distinct tech_task_id from BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW f where f.bus_number=#{bus_number} ) and f.confirmor_date>0 group by f.tech_task_id,f.factory,f.workshop) tmp group by tmp.tech_task_id,tmp.factory
mapper.update: update BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW set confirmor_date=#{confirmor_date}, confirmor_id=#{confirmor_id} where find_in_set (id,#{tech_task_follow_ids})>0
mapper.select: SELECT T.*,K1.key_name AS ECN_CHANGE_TYPE,K2.key_name AS ECN_TYPE FROM BMS_TECH_TASK T LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_KEY K1 ON T.tech_order_type = K1.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_KEY K2 ON T.tech_type = K2.id WHERE T.id = #{taskid}
SELECT * FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_DETAIL t WHERE t.tech_task_id = #{taskid}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(S.finish) AS finish_str FROM ( SELECT (CONCAT(t.workshop,':',COUNT(distinct(t.bus_number)))) AS finish FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW t WHERE t.tech_task_id = #{taskid} AND t.order_no = #{order_no} AND t.factory = #{factory} AND t.confirmor_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY workshop ) S
mapper.update: UPDATE BMS_TECH_MATERIAL SET material_checker_id = #{userid}, material_check_date = #{curTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE BMS_TECH_TASK SET tech_single_price = #{tech_single_price} WHERE tech_order_no = #{tech_order_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(T.id) AS CHECK_COUNT FROM BMS_TECH_MATERIAL T WHERE T.tech_task_id = #{taskid} AND T.material_checker_id = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE BMS_TECH_TASK SET material_checker_id = #{userid}, material_check_date = #{curTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select sum(h.work_hour) total_hour,o.name work_org,s.staff_number,s.name staff_name,s.plant_org,s.workshop_org,s.workgroup_org,s.team_org,s.job,s.skill_parameter from BMS_HR_STAFF_TECH_HOURS h left join BMS_BASE_ORG o on h.org_id=o.id left join BMS_HR_STAFF s on h.staff_number=s.staff_number where 1=1 and h.ecn_task_id=#{taskid} group by s.staff_number

SELECT t.*,k.key_name AS tech_order_type_name, k2.key_name AS tech_type_name,k3.key_name AS duty_unit_name FROM BMS_TECH_TASK t LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_KEY k ON t.tech_order_type = k.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_KEY k2 ON t.tech_type = k2.id LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_KEY k3 ON t.duty_unit = k3.id WHERE 1=1
and t.task_content like (concat('%',#{task_content},'%'))
and t.tech_order_no like (concat('%',#{tech_order_no},'%'))
and t.tech_date>=#{tech_date_start}
and t.tech_date<=#{tech_date_end}
and t.edit_date !='' and t.assign_date ='' and t.assess_date ='' and t.finish_date =''
and t.assign_date !='' and t.assess_date ='' and t.finish_date =''
and t.assess_date !='' and t.finish_date =''
and t.finish_date !=''
order by t.id desc
LIMIT ${start} ,${length}
SELECT t.* FROM BMS_TECH_TASK t WHERE 1=1 AND t.id = #{id}

SELECT count(t.id) FROM BMS_TECH_TASK t WHERE 1=1
and t.task_content like (concat('%',#{task_content},'%'))
and t.tech_order_no like (concat('%',#{tech_order_no},'%'))
and t.tech_date>=#{tech_date_start}
and t.tech_date<=#{tech_date_end}
and t.edit_date !='' and t.assign_date ='' and t.assess_date ='' and t.finish_date =''
and t.assign_date !='' and t.assess_date ='' and t.finish_date =''
and t.assess_date !='' and t.finish_date =''
and t.finish_date !=''
SELECT t.* FROM BMS_TECH_MATERIAL t WHERE 1=1 and t.tech_task_id = #{tech_task_id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
INSERT INTO BMS_TECH_TASK(task_content,tech_order_no,tech_point_num,tech_order_type,tech_type,tech_date,duty_unit,major_change,repeat_change,custom_change,custom_change_no,tech_order_file,custom_change_file,editor_id,edit_date) VALUES(#{task_content},#{tech_order_no},#{tech_point_num},#{tech_order_type},#{tech_type},#{tech_date},#{duty_unit},#{major_change},#{repeat_change},#{custom_change},#{custom_change_no},#{tech_order_file},#{custom_change_file},#{editor_id},#{edit_date})
mapper.select:
SELECT f.id, f.follow_num, u.username AS confirmor, f.confirmor_date FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW_PRE AS f LEFT JOIN BMS_BASE_USER AS u ON u.id = f.confirmor_id
WHERE 1=1 and f.tech_task_id = #{tech_task_id} and f.order_no = #{order_no} and f.factory = #{factory} and f.workshop = #{workshop} order by f.confirmor_date
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
INSERT INTO BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW_PRE(tech_task_id,factory,workshop,follow_num,confirmor_id,confirmor_date,order_no,task_detail_id) VALUES(#{tech_task_id},#{factory},#{workshop},#{follow_num},#{confirmor_id},#{confirmor_date},#{order_no},#{task_detail_id})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
INSERT INTO BMS_TECH_TASK(task_content,tech_order_no,tech_point_num,tech_order_type,tech_type,tech_date,duty_unit,major_change,repeat_change,custom_change,custom_change_no,tech_order_file,custom_change_file,editor_id,edit_date) VALUES(#{task_content},#{tech_order_no},#{tech_point_num},#{tech_order_type},#{tech_type},#{tech_date},#{duty_unit},#{major_change},#{repeat_change},#{custom_change},#{custom_change_no},#{tech_order_file},#{custom_change_file},#{editor_id},#{edit_date})
mapper.select: SELECT F.*,P.process_name,U.username FROM BMS_TECH_TASK_FOLLOW F LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_PLAN_BUS B ON F.bus_number = B.bus_number LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_BASE_PROCESS P ON B.latest_process_id = P.id LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_BASE_USER U ON F.confirmor_id = U.staff_number WHERE F.task_detail_id = #{task_detail_id} AND F.factory = #{factory} AND F.workshop = #{workshop} AND F.order_no = #{order_no} ORDER BY F.bus_number
